experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Refined data processing in model build and analysis pipeline, transforming raw data into inferred values with comprehensive automated unit and integration testing. Optimized system scalability through time complexity improvements, enhancing overall performance. Troubleshot and resolved model build pipeline failures in staging and production environments using CloudWatch logs. Streamlined and automated DevOps processes by restructuring CI/CD workflows with GitHub Actions. Implementing data export/import functionality for timeseries data purge and restore, improving database efficiency and data lifecycle management.
reference_context: Refined data processing, automated testing, optimized system scalability.
experiences.reasoning: This role highlights experience in software engineering and DevOps with tasks related to data pipeline optimization, CI/CD processes, and AWS.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.description: Implemented OFSAA LLFP fintech solutions in SIT, UAT and provided post-implementation support in Production environments for 2 international financial banking firms. Engineered 6 GUI based workflow runs for ETL pipelines with numerous tasks and integrated them with backend scripts to process data from Pre-staging to end-user report generation stage. Enhanced UI for Individual Assessment (IA) module based on XML Forms Framework by customizing 4 UI Forms and 8 PL/SQL scripts to process over 300k customer records by proposing to debug existing legacy code. Generated PL/SQL scripts for data manipulation and validation to automate manual tasks for filtering source data that helped reduce execution times by 20% while generating end-user reports containing customer data for over 6 months. Documented technical designs and deployed code packages across environments via WinSCP/PuTTY client-server apps.
reference_context: Implemented fintech solutions, developed ETL workflows, and enhanced customer data processing.
experiences.reasoning: This role involved software engineering in the finance sector, focusing on fintech solution implementation, ETL workflow engineering, and PL/SQL scripting.

experiences.title: Embedded C++ Developer
experiences.description: Worked under Dr. Joby Antony, formerly Visiting Scientist at CERN. Designed software modules for ARM Cortex-M3 embedded server sensor device to measure subzero temperatures. Troubleshot bugs and optimized the system to handle real-time sensor data via RPC transfer protocols.
reference_context: Worked on ARM Cortex-M3 devices, optimized real-time data handling.
experiences.reasoning: This position contributed to experience in embedded systems development, system optimization, and real-time data handling.

experiences.title: Python Developer
experiences.description: Worked under the guidance of Ms. Vanita Agarwal. Modeled discrete mathematical Rough Set Theory concepts for Sensor Data Mining using Python. Designed a custom-built library to process 65,536 objects in 2 minutes with 95% accuracy using linear regression.
reference_context: Modeled Rough Set Theory for data mining, designed efficient processing libraries.
experiences.reasoning: This role demonstrates competence in data science and Python programming, focusing on mathematical modeling and efficient data processing algorithms.
